summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Gantt Pro multi-user furniture factory management system. Backend APIs tested with 84.8% success rate, frontend UI fully functional with role-based access controls working correctly.

critical_bugs.issue: Non-designer users (manufacturing, purchasing) can create projects when only designers should have this permission
critical_bugs.impact: Critical security vulnerability - breaks role-based access control

minor_issues.issue: Email validation rejects emails with Spanish characters (ñ) like diseñador@ganttpro.com
minor_issues.impact: Prevents login for some test users

ui_bugs.issue: Purchase Orders navigation not visible for purchasing role user

console_warnings.issue: React hydration warnings for table structure (span inside tbody)

action_item_for_main_agent.critical: Fix role-based access control in project creation - non-designers should not be able to create projects
action_item_for_main_agent.high_priority: Add Purchase Orders navigation to sidebar for purchasing role users
action_item_for_main_agent.medium_priority: Fix email validation to accept Spanish characters in login system
action_item_for_main_agent.low_priority: Resolve React hydration warnings in Projects table component

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (most UI components working, minor navigation issue)
